name: Bridge Challenge تحدي الجسر
description:
Can you make it across the bridge?

Carefully press down on the screen to bump the car across the bridge and onto the other side. Try not to stop on the bridge or over-power and fall into the water.

How many bridges can you cross?
Once you start playing, you won't be able to stop.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Press down on screen and hold to increase 'bump' power
- Let go and catapult car across to the other side
- Be careful not to over-power and end up head first in the water

FEATURES:
- Dynamically generated bridges, land and trees so that you get a different level each time you play
- Game center and Leaderboard
- Settings and Ad removal options
- Share your score on your favorite social media
- Bonus points system
- Endless, addictive, bridge-crossing fun
- More updates to the game coming soon...

Compete against others around the world to become the bridge-crossing champion.

If you really like the game please take a second to rate it. Thanks
